name: Applicability
text:
(a)  Prior to June 30, 2006, this part shall apply to the demonstration project statewide.
     (b)  Community care foster family homes shall be required to reserve at least one bed for medicaid patients. [L 2001, c 273, pt of §1, §6; am L 2003, c 98, §§2, 3; am L 2004, c 153, pt of §1, §§2, 5; am L 2006, c 236, §1]
